code: import axios from'axios';const API_BASE=process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL||'https://intersys-payroll.onrender.com';const api=axios.create({baseURL:API_BASE,headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'}});export const employeesAPI={create:data=>api.post('/employees/',data),list:()=>api.get('/employees/')};export const attendanceAPI={create:(employeeId,data)=>api.post("/attendance/".concat(employeeId,"/records"),data),list:employeeId=>api.get("/attendance/".concat(employeeId,"/records"))};export const payrollAPI={run:data=>api.post('/payroll/run',data),getRuns:()=>api.get('/payroll/runs'),getPayslips:runId=>api.get("/payroll/runs/".concat(runId,"/payslips")),downloadPayslip:(runId,employeeId)=>api.get("/payroll/runs/".concat(runId,"/payslip/").concat(employeeId,"/pdf"),{responseType:'blob'}),downloadSummary:runId=>api.get("/payroll/runs/".concat(runId,"/export/summary.xlsx"),{responseType:'blob'})};export default api;
